name: Andrew Lobacz
text: We went on Valentine’s Day.   We have made a tradition out of it for years.   This year we ordered some wings, boneless, which was basically one chicken breast cut up in pieces, usually 15 wings would be enough for my wife and daughter to …More

name: Bart Schutz
text: We are done with Bostons in Newburgh.  It should have been obvious this place was close to failure when there was only about a dozen people in the restaurant  (and bar) at 6pm.  I ordered the slab of ribs special for $20.  Pictured is what …More

name: Danielle Robbins
text: Delicious food! My husband won gift cards from here so we went to try them out. The drinks were fantastic, the pizza was great! The atmosphere was really fun. I will definitely be back!

name: Andrew Nunn
text: Great food and good service. A bit pricey but the food is worth it.

name: Wendell Baker
text: The food might take a little but it's worth the wait, they have great mocktails very delicious and the staff is nice. I can never finish my food tho its a heaping portion so you get leftovers for dinner or maybe breakfast.

name: Leslie Webb
text: Good food but horrible service. Waited 20 minutes after we were seated for someone to take our drink order and ordered food at the same time. It took so long to get drinks that several from our party went to the bar to get drinks. I ordered …More

name: Patti Corbett
text: My second late dinner this week after leaving Mom at Gateway. Both times Mike took care of us in the bar. Dinner was fantastic, great tunes playin' and super service.  Be sure to try the new Cactus Cuts & Dip! THE best new appetizer/ side this summer.

name: Sean M
text: They have a large menu for sure.  Pizza, pasta, etc.  My kids enjoyed their wings, I had a calzone.  The flat bread wasn't exactly traditional, but it was okay.  In general, it seemed like a good family place.  There was a separate bar I didn't go into.  Their draft beer selection was poor though.

name: DJ White
text: Food variety was great. Taste was average overall. I ordered Rice Florentine and was told it was safe. It came as a mix of rice and orzo which is a pasta and not safe for a wheat allergy. The rice tasted great, best thing on my plate, …More

name: Hector Cabrera
text: Good service, very attentive and nice waiters. The food was tasty but we found small pieces of bones on a burger. They apologized and obviously took it off the bill. Never had happened before, if go again.

name: Carolyn McGinnis
text: TERRIBLE SERVICE....Just left the restaurant in Evansville, Indiana.  Was seated right away.  After SEVERAL servers walked past our table and did not  acknowledge us we left.  As a side note there were maybe 3 other table that had people …More

name: Eve Miguez
text: Ribs were awesome!!  Sevice was fantastic. Definitely will return when come back to the area.

name: Niterider Allen
text: I always went by this place and wanted to try it, take it from me DONT! Definitely not fresh food. We were served old dry chicken and vegetables. Tasted like it was microwaved and the chips I had we're covered in grease. I feel the $26 that was spent was a total waste. Definitely could have had better food just staying at home.

name: susan gerber
text: First time there ordered drinks and told the waitress we wanted an appetizer and she walked away. Didnt even get to Roderick so we walked out never again would I go there. Treated badly

name: Lilith Gishtah
text: Service was great. The waiter made sure our food was vegan, and with a dash of red pepper flakes, it was delectable. The lemonade Red Bull mocktail was also satisfactory. I was not misgendered, therefore, this is an inclusive place to eat. Thank you for the wonderful service.

name: Melissa Nelson
text: We waited 10 minutes to even be seated. There were only two other tables. We ordered water and when it was brought, it tasted weird so we asked for new waters. We then waited almost a half hour just to listen to them talking in the kitchen …More

name: Carol Ellard
text:
Seated quickly, very good service, quality food.
I had the chicken parmesan and hubby had grilled chicken with Florentine rice and broccoli. Both dishes were super.

name: Rebecca L
text: During this visit, soda machines were down. The food was decent but it was with a long wait time. Overall, enjoyed it.

name: Olivia Martinbb
text: Came in at 2:15 on a Saturday, only 3 tables were being used, yet it took 15 minutes to be seated. Took another 15 to even take our order. Had to leave before we got our food because we were late for an appointment. Didn’t get to eat. No apology for the wait. Hostess was on phone. Appetizer was decent 😅

text: Loved the atmosphere and great food. Pizza very good and Sliders are perfect for a quick snack

name: Hannah P
text: Worst service ever. Appetizer came out after the food. Didn't get silverware with our food. She said she would go get it. Look over to see her waiting other tables and doing other things. We sat in front of our food without silverware and …More

name: Ed Schoenecker
text: Good food, usually not crowded.  They have one of the nicest wait staff in Evansville.  Their prices are not cheap, my wife and I had lunch their last week, no alcohol and the prices was less than $32.00.

name: Smokerpoker 227
text: I love their pizza and always have good experiences when i go in person. But they advertise that they deliver but the last couple times i have called they tell me they aren’t delivering. It’s like they deliver one day and then not the next 3 or 4. It’s incredibly irritating

name: Kay Reed
text: Great food once again. Went with a group of friends. Service was a little slow. However menu is extensive and has items not offered by other restsurants. So fun to choose something different!

name: Jodie Mowrey
text: Dude, I just called in an order to Boston’s and the guy was such a stoner he could barely take my order. We ordered fish and chips, but didn’t get the chips. We ordered salad but didn’t get the salad dressing. We ordered hamburgers but …More

name: Aaron Lutz
text: 1st Visit- Had awesome half off appetizers late at night. Can't remember if it was on a weekend or week day. It's totally worth coming in to drink and have half off appetizers! I had Nachos and pizza and they were fantastic for the price I …More

name: Josh Beavin
text: There was nobody here and service was still slow. Food was terrible and overpriced.

name: Vanessa Lemasters
text: They were out of Buffalo sauce which was needed in our order and out of the sauce for our seafood tacos, brought them anyway and didn't say a word about it until we asked and did nothing to try and right the situation. Our food was also …More

name: Sav Joy
text: Oh my lord the best mushroom lovers flatpan pizza ive ever had. I ate it all by myself lol! My boyfriend ate a whole pizza as well! The drinks i ordered were subperb. Hard to find a place like this around here.

name: Bob Dugan
text: System was updating so we had to wait to get our check. I really don't like being held hostage after we ate indefinitely . Usually places comp something and don't make you wait . Food was gross . Server was nice.

name: Cole Wonders
text: The food was pretty good but it was definately overpriced. An appetizer, salad, flatbread pizza and a few beers was $70 after tip.

name: Eric Higgs
text: Me and my family has been dodging this place for a while because of the service but we decided to give it one more chance. Ordered a pizza and it was good but the Parmesan Cheese had mold in it..... We are done with Boston's!

name: Stephanie Willett
text: Great service and food, but the French Dip is different every time I order it. The first time I had it, it was amazing so I keep trying :) Very accommodating for our kids who need things "perfect." Much appreciated. :)

name: Mike C
text: The pizza is always loaded with fresh ingredients, The wait staff was very friendly and efficient .This place is a good place to take the family or if you want to watch a game the bar area is well equipped with TV's with every way you turn .

text: The restaurant was clean along with restrooms. We ordered the team platter it was well worth price.  Two of us ate and had plenty of leftovers .The pickles were my favorite. Boneless wings were juicy. The reason why I didn't give 5 stars the dressing were runny it it keep going all over the place.

text: Waitress was great but the food was just not great.  Got the sliders. One of each, they were mostly stale brioche.  The breaded chicken slider is just a chicken finger on a bun. The bbq had some nasty slaw on it and the burger was very …More

text: First time here. Delicious food. Quick and attentive service. Appetizer came fast. It was bacon wrapped steak. Wonderful.  Can't wait to come back and try other items.
